Document.Title: HTML: The "Combo Box" in SELECT Markup

Content:
<!-- What Microsoft calls the "combo box"... -->
<FORM>
    <SELECT NAME="MyOptionGroup">
        <OPTION VALUE=MyStringValue1, SELECTED>MyItem1
        <OPTION>MyItem2
        <!-- more group items appear here... -->
        <OPTION>MyItemN
    </SELECT>
</FORM>
